services.name: Basic Manicure
services.description: Classic care for your hands including nail shaping, cuticle care, hand massage, and polish application.

services.name: Deluxe Manicure
services.description: Enhanced hand care with exfoliation, extended massage, hydrating mask, and premium polish application.

services.name: Gel Manicure
services.description: Long-lasting gel polish application with all the care of a basic manicure. No-chip formula lasts up to 2 weeks.

services.name: Basic Pedicure
services.description: Comprehensive foot care including soak, exfoliation, nail shaping, cuticle care, foot massage, and polish application.

services.name: Deluxe Pedicure
services.description: Premium foot care with aromatic soak, intensive exfoliation, callus removal, extended massage with hot stones, mask, and premium polish.

services.name: Gel Pedicure
services.description: All the benefits of a basic pedicure with long-lasting gel polish that remains flawless for up to 3 weeks.

services.name: Acrylic Full Set
services.description: Complete acrylic nail application including nail preparation, tips or forms, acrylic application, shaping, and polish.

services.name: Acrylic Fill
services.description: Maintenance service for growing acrylic nails, filling the gap between the cuticle and existing acrylic.

services.name: Nail Art
services.description: Creative designs painted on your nails, from simple patterns to elaborate artwork. Price varies by complexity.
services.priceNote: Starts at $10, varies by design complexity
services.durationNote: Added to service time, varies by design complexity

services.name: Polish Change (Hands)
services.description: Quick nail polish removal and fresh application for hands. Does not include nail shaping or cuticle care.

services.name: Polish Change (Feet)
services.description: Quick nail polish removal and fresh application for feet. Does not include nail shaping or cuticle care.
